description: Compaction summary response — initial summarization of a coding session

events.data:
{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Goal
Implement a real-time metrics dashboard using Phoenix LiveView.

## Constraints & Preferences
- Use LiveView for real-time WebSocket updates
- Poll metrics every 5 seconds
- Follow existing project patterns

"}

{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Progress
### Done
- [x] Created DashboardLive module with mount/3 and handle_info/2
- [x] Added /dashboard route to router.ex
- [x] Implemented metrics polling with :timer.send_interval
- [x] Created dashboard test file

### In Progress
- [ ] Adding chart visualization for historical data

"}

{"type":"response.output_text.delta","delta":"## Key Decisions
- **:timer.send_interval**: Simpler than Process.send_after for fixed-interval polling
- **ETS for metric history**: Fast reads without GenServer bottleneck

## Next Steps
1. Add chart integration
2. Add authentication guard to dashboard route

## Critical Context
- MetricsCollector GenServer at lib/app/metrics_collector.ex
- Dashboard subscribes to PubSub topic metrics:update"}

{"type":"response.output_text.done","text":"## Goal
Implement a real-time metrics dashboard using Phoenix LiveView.

## Constraints & Preferences
- Use LiveView for real-time WebSocket updates
- Poll metrics every 5 seconds
- Follow existing project patterns

## Progress
### Done
- [x] Created DashboardLive module with mount/3 and handle_info/2
- [x] Added /dashboard route to router.ex
- [x] Implemented metrics polling with :timer.send_interval
- [x] Created dashboard test file

### In Progress
- [ ] Adding chart visualization for historical data

## Key Decisions
- **:timer.send_interval**: Simpler than Process.send_after for fixed-interval polling
- **ETS for metric history**: Fast reads without GenServer bottleneck

## Next Steps
1. Add chart integration
2. Add authentication guard to dashboard route

## Critical Context
- MetricsCollector GenServer at lib/app/metrics_collector.ex
- Dashboard subscribes to PubSub topic metrics:update"}
